name: Vegan Gluten free Ginger Molasses cookies
description: These Vegan Gluten free Ginger Molasses cookies are easy & have a few ingredients. Look at those crinkles! no shortening.Vegan, Dairy-free, Palm-oil-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup coconut sugar  (or ground raw sugar)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine all the wet ingredients and whisk until the sugar dissolves. 1 to 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, combine all the wet ingredients and whisk until the sugar dissolves. 1 to 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix all the dry ingredients. Whisk well.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix all the dry ingredients. Whisk well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dry to wet and and mix to make a soft somewhat sticky dough. Let the dough sit for 5 minutes. Pre-heat the oven to 360 degrees F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dry to wet and and mix to make a soft somewhat sticky dough. Let the dough sit for 5 minutes. Pre-heat the oven to 360 degrees F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the ingredients to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the ingredients to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: (If the dough is too sticky, add a Tbsp or more oat flour and mix in into the dough). Grease your hands and take 2 to 2.5 Tbsp of the dough, roll it into a smooth ball, coat in sugar mixture. Place on parchment lined sheet and flatten slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: (If the dough is too sticky, add a Tbsp or more oat flour and mix in into the dough). Grease your hands and take 2 to 2.5 Tbsp of the dough, roll it into a smooth ball, coat in sugar mixture. Place on parchment lined sheet and flatten slightly.

recipeInstructions.text: Put a drop of water in the center of each cookie. Bake for 11 to 13 minutes or until the top is set.
recipeInstructions.name: Put a drop of water in the center of each cookie. Bake for 11 to 13 minutes or until the top is set.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely before serving (15 to 20 mins). The cookies keep cooking and pick up the sweetness from the sugar coating as they sit.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely before serving (15 to 20 mins). The cookies keep cooking and pick up the sweetness from the sugar coating as they sit.

keywords: gluten free ginger cookies, gluten free molasses cookies, vegan molasses cookies
